body.name: MoKo Camera Tripod for iPad - 70" Phone Tripod Stand with Travel Bag, Tripod for iPhone with Phone Holder, Wireless Remote, Travel Tripod for Camera DSLR SLR, Cell Phones, Tablets, Projector, Webcam

features: 📸【𝐏𝐡𝐨𝐧𝐞 & 𝐓𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞𝐭 & 𝐂𝐚𝐦𝐞𝐫𝐚 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐛𝐥𝐞】The camera tripod is designed with quick-release plate with standard 1/4" screw to fit all cameras, projector, camcorders, ring light, spotting scopes,etc. Comes with a detachable 2-in-1 holder for tablet and cell phone, and a GoPro holder. ( iPad holder extends from 4.33 to 7.2 inches. Phone holder extends from 2.17 to 3.3 inches.)

📸【𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 & 𝐒𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐝𝐲 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐯𝐞𝐥 𝐓𝐫𝐢𝐩𝐨𝐝】The tripod for camera is made of sturdy aluminum alloy with a load capacity of up to 11.02lbs/5kg, Features a heavy-duty hook for hanging items, an anti-slip pad on its foot ensures a comfortable shooting experience, and ultra-stability for long exposures, multi-shots, and panorama stitching.

📸【𝐕𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐥𝐞 𝐂𝐚𝐦𝐞𝐫𝐚 𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐧𝐝】This iPad tripod can be adjusted the height from 20 to 70 inches with 4 level height adjustment to meet different requirements for variety of shooting environments and photography needs. 20" compact storage size and 2.87 lbs weight make this tripod for ipad easy to carry. One storage bag is included for portability.

📸【𝟑-𝐰𝐚𝐲 𝐏𝐚𝐧 𝐇𝐞𝐚𝐝 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝟑𝟔𝟎° 𝐑𝐨𝐭𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧】The iPad tripod stand features 3-way pan head for tilt and swivel motion, so you can adjust the device with 360 degree of horizontal direction and 180 degree of tilt. The top-plate can be adjusted from 0 to 90 to find the best angle for landscape shooting or portrait shooting. Built-in bubble level contributes to exact horizontal alignment.

📸【𝐖𝐢𝐫𝐞𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐑𝐞𝐦𝐨𝐭𝐞 𝐒𝐡𝐨𝐨𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠】The tripod for iphone is equipped with a wireless remote for easy phone control and allowing you to take photos and videos from 30ft/10m away. Perfect for taking occasional private photos such as selfie, family gatherings, and vlogging, etc.

📸【𝐖𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐥𝐲 𝐀𝐩𝐩𝐥𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧】 The phone tripod stand is suitable for photographing events and video recordings such as selfies, family portrait photos, parties, traveling, hiking, sports, YouTube, Vlog, video conferencing, online meetings, live streaming, recording games, yoga videos, outside with wind, and other activities indoors and outdoors.

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: Portable, Lightweight, Pan-handle, Remote Control, Foldable

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Durable, portable, adjustable, professional - it all comes together Designed for great portability, the versatile tripod is easy to take with you wherever you go. The combination of heavy-duty aluminium alloy and non-slip feet provides excellent stability on a variety of terrains, enhancing your shooting experiments in landscape photography, portrait photography, video recording, live streaming and more. What are you waiting for? Come on, let's go explore the big world and record all those amazing things with MoKo portable camer tripod!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Serious range of flexibility
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this a lot lately for my Holiday season social media recording. It has serious range for height and device positioning. It even has a hook for counterweights. The remote helps for controlling your device once in position, and I absolutely love that it comes with a carrying case with shoulder strap for easier transport. The legs adjust individually, so if you need one shorter or longer for an uneven surface prop, you can do that. It has multiple position tightening spots so you can angle your camera or ipad or phone in any number of configurations. I haven't tried the upside down for overhead recording but it may be able to do so, but not sure. The mounts fit with a thick case without problems, however I do run into problems with my popsocket holder in the way. That is not this equipment's fault but it would be nice if the holder grips were a little longer to make up for so many people who use those.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it! Very sturdy!
reviews.reviewText: I love the clips that hold each segment in place instead of a typical screwing action. It is very tall, taller than me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It works good
reviews.reviewText: Im a big fan of this tripod, it's better than the one provided by my school. However, I do wish this had better instructions on how to set it up. I'm semi new to the world of photography and film so I had a little trouble, and I can't figure out how to put the rotary handle on. Other than that, it's great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy, flexible with a plenty of height extension

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Only down side was it didn’t fit my iPad Pro. But I purchased an extended piece to fix that problem. Other than that this is an amazing high quality tripod!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great tripod for the money
reviews.reviewText: Small and compact. Gets the job done, easy to setup. It feels sturdy at each height.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So my worst thoughts on this are that its a not as sturdy as it could be. the legs are pretty thin and could easily break if an accident were to happen with it deployed. It is stable and has a lot of adjust ability. There are a good amount of attachments in the carrying bag. Its a decent stand for a light camera.I received this via the Amazon vine program.My opinions are my own and weren't influenced by anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good tripod for beginning cell phone photographers
reviews.reviewText: This is a decent camera tripod for the price. It has lots of great features to support cell phone camera users which I really like. It is fairly easy to set up out of the bag but I do have some complaints with this (discuss later.) The tripod is very sturdy and secure once the locks are engaged and the clamps tightened. Thread the head onto the tripod and we are largely ready to go. The quick-release plate comes off to make installing our phone onto it or adjusting placement easier. Just stretch the clamp and slide the phone in. There are levels both on the head and tripod which make it very simple to align properly. I like how we can adjust the head to many different angles which makes getting great shots a breeze. The bag is a disappointment and I shall purchase a replacement soon. Why have a bag made that does not fit the assembled product? We cannot leave the feet or head installed on the tripod and insert it in the bag. This greatly increases the likelihood we will lose the parts removed. On the tripod, the Center column lift rocker feels somewhat flimsy but it gets the job done. One of my bigger frustrations is the rotary handle fastening nut falls out easily (the rotary handle threads into it.) There is a notch the nut sits in but for some reason, it is not secured in place. I leave the handle installed to prevent it from falling out. This product does work well once put together and I would recommend it for cell phone photographers to get experience with.
